title: Theoretical study of the catalytic hydrodeoxygenation of furan, methylfuran and benzofurane on MoS2
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22540-22547
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03043E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wilfried G. Kanhounnon, Saber Gueddida, Simplice Koudjina, Frédéric Richard, Guy Y. S. Atohoun, Jean-François Paul, Sébastien Lebègue, Michael Badawi
Herein, we have studied the direct deoxygenation (DDO) (without prior hydrogenation) of furan, 2-methylfuran and benzofuran on the metal edge of MoS2 with a vacancy created under pressure of dihydrogen.
